item.title: jobhistory关注的issue
item.description: JobHistory cache issue https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MAPREDUCE-6436 可能导致打印的日志太多影响性能 Job history server scans can become blocked on a single, slow entry https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MAPREDUCE-6797 High contention on scanning of user directory under immediate_done in Job History Server https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MAPREDUCE-6684
